text: Bulleribasidium is a genus of fungi in the family Tremellaceae. The genus is monotypic, containing the single species Bulleribasidium oberjochense, found in Germany. It is an anamorphic form of Bullera. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Tremellomycetes Category:Fungi of Europe Category:Monotypic Basidiomycota genera
title: Bulleribasidium
